name: stahlregen + flexi + martin - thunderstorm

shape_0_per_frame1=x = .25*instance/num_instance;
shapecode_1_enabled=0
shapecode_1_sides=4

shapecode_1_g2=1.000

shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=// <<-- Stahlregen's (off)beat detection 
per_frame_2=// frame counter for average
per_frame_3=count = count+1;
per_frame_4=// counters of the bass/treb/mid values for average
per_frame_5=bc = bc+bass;
per_frame_6=tc = tc+treb;
per_frame_7=mc = mc+mid;
per_frame_8=// checking for impact: highest of bass/mid/treb has impact
per_frame_9=bimp = if(above(3.25*bass,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_10=timp = if(above(2.75*treb,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_11=mimp = if(above(2.75*mid,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_12=// checking for beats: compare adjusted buffered 
per_frame_13=// vs. average value and check for impact
per_frame_14=is_beat = if(above(.85*bass,bc/count),1*bimp,
per_frame_15=if(above(.85*treb,tc/count),1*timp,
per_frame_16=if(above(.85*mid,mc/count),1*mimp,
per_frame_17=0))); 
per_frame_18=// restricting max number of beats per second (fraction of fps)
per_frame_19=is_beat = if(above(reha,0),0,is_beat);
per_frame_20=reha = if(is_beat,.5*fps,if(below(reha,1),0,reha-1));
per_frame_21=// end of (off)beat detection -->
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=wave_b = if(is_beat,0,.5+.4*sin(time+bass+treb+mid));
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=wave_r = is_beat;
per_frame_26=wave_g = is_beat;
per_frame_27=wave_thick = 1-is_beat;
per_frame_28=wave_brighten = is_beat;
per_frame_29=q1 = is_beat;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=wave_mystery = if(is_beat,1-.002*rand(100),0);
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=wave_x = if(is_beat,.1+rand(80)*0.01,.6);
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=wave_size = if(is_beat,1,2);
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=dy = .01;
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=warp = .1+.125*bass_att;
per_pixel_1=sx = 1+0.2*(1-y);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`// sample previous frame
warp_5=`ret.xy = GetBlur1(uv_orig).xy;
warp_6=`uv = frac(uv);    
warp_7=`ret.z = lerp(lerp(GetPixel(uv),GetBlur1(uv),.5),tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz,1-rad).z;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`//error diffusion dither by Geiss
warp_10=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_11=`ret.z += .5*(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).z-0.5)/256.0*15;
warp_12=`    
warp_13=`// darken (decay) over time
warp_14=`ret *= float3(0.75,0.6,0.98); //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`
comp_6=`
comp_7=`// ***** Martin's ripples on water surface code, parameterized by Flexi *****
comp_8=`
comp_9=`
comp_10=`float h = .4;                      // height of the horizon
comp_11=`float cut_off = 0.0;              // cut off lower border
comp_12=`float2 t = float2(0.1,-0.05)*time;  // velocity
comp_13=`float strength = 0.025;
comp_14=`
comp_15=`
comp_16=`float2 c = uv_orig-float2(0.5,1-h);
comp_17=`float z = 3/c.y;
comp_18=`float2 uv_water = float2(c.x*z*h,z*h)*0.05+t;
comp_19=`int mask = (c.y>0);
comp_20=`uv_water = (tex2D(sampler_noise_hq,uv_water)-0.5)*mask;
comp_21=`float2 uv_mirror = 1.0-abs(frac((c+float2(0.5,1))*0.5)*2-1)+float2(0,-cut_off);
comp_22=`uv_mirror =frac(uv_mirror-uv_water.xy*strength);
comp_23=`
comp_24=`// ***** :)
comp_25=`
comp_26=`uv = uv_mirror;
comp_27=`
comp_28=`ret = GetPixel(uv)*(1+3*q1);
comp_29=`ret *= 1.33;
comp_30=`}
